message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the evaluation and recalibration of classifiers, which is a common topic in machine learning. The use of a generative model for the classifier's confidence scores suggests that the paper may fall under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The application of the approach to image classification (as mentioned in the abstract) suggests that it may also fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision). The use of labeled examples and the focus on performance evaluation suggests that it may also fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of confidence scores and the mention of recalibration suggest that it may also fall under cs.CL (Computation and Language) or cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
